title: OCE's limited game modes?
body: Why is it that OCE only has three permanent game modes? we get ranked, normal blind pick, or Arams. those are our pvp choices. occassionally we get treeline. and on the weekend we get whatever game mode is there (Bring back urf damn it) but seriously, i want to be able to have a Normal draft mode. i am sick of being shafted every single game into the bot lane because Riot doesn't think we're important enough to have a ranked practice mode. because as it stands the only way that i would ever be able to reliably get the lane i want is to play ranked. but no i am not going to take a first time champ into ranked. because im not an idiot. so why does every other server get to have normal draft except oce? and don't give me any of that BS about there not being enough players. there's plenty of players. the sheer amount of people that play league is crazy. there is enough. and if there isn't then who the hell decided it was a good idea to get rid of Draft OVER blind pick? what the hell is that bs?

replies.body:
You want a full proper server?

The answer is simple.
Increase the server population to match the other regions.

Get out there and get everyone you know into playing the game, then get everyone they know playing.

Unless if the server population significantly changes we wont be getting proper queues filled out.

just play flex.

Riot are removing Draft normals from most other servers.

All i think they should add is the role selector to normals. Even if there are no bans, a role selector would help most issues
